param.name: HOST
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Host]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Full path to the Samba Share without trailing slash. Can contain user:password too.]

param.name: PATH
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Uri]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Path to the root folder on the server]

param.name: RECYCLE_BIN
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Recycle Bin Folder]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Leave empty if you do not want to use a recycle bin.]

param.name: CHMOD_VALUE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[File Creation Mask]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Optionnaly apply a chmod operation. Value must be numeric, like 0777, 0644, etc.]

param.name: DEFAULT_RIGHTS
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Default Rights]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[This right pattern (empty, r, or rw) will be applied at user creation for this repository.]

param.name: CHARSET
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Character Encoding]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[If your server does not set correctly its charset, it can be good to specify it here manually.]

param.name: PAGINATION_THRESHOLD
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Pagination Threshold]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[When a folder will contain more items than this number, display will switch to pagination mode, for better performances.]

param.name: PAGINATION_NUMBER
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[#Items per page]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Once in pagination mode, number of items to display per page.]
